name: KajaNe Mua Private Villa & Mansion

reviews.title: Heaven. Did not want to leave.
reviews.text: We stayed here 2 nights in February with friends. We had one of the 2BR villas. It is an uphill hike to the villa but worth it. Both bedrooms were amazing, our pool was huge, and we even had our own rice paddy.

reviews.title: the best
reviews.text: The service was great. We had breakfast delivered daily to the villa. No internet service in the villas however. But who wants it. They had a computer upstairs from the main desk and wifi near the front desk as well. Just staying 2 days there, they knew our first names.

reviews.title: Fantastic - Exceeded All Expectations
reviews.text: The location if fantastic. Right in the middle of Ubud on Monkey Forest Rd., but the villas are set far enough away that you don't notice it at all. You could walk to the Monkey forest, the palace, and they provide free transportation anywhere in Ubud. They also have bikes to use for free. Beware, we took advantage of this one day and the area is very hilly so you wear out quickly.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: If you want to see rice paddies, have them take to you Tengalala. It's a $10USD charge but worth it.

reviews.title: I didn't know luxury could be so affordable!
reviews.text: The restaurant across the street has 2-for-1 mojitos that are great. Happy hour from 4-7pm. Also, the Kenko's foot massage place across the street is also very good.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a good reason why Kajane Mua Villas consistently gets a 5.0 rating - it is truly wonderful and everything we expected!
reviews.title: Kajane gets another 5.0 and deserves it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is amazing and very mindful without being in your face. We stayed 2 nights in Beji Naba - a private villa with a salt water pool. I've never been in a salt water pool but really like the concept as it has less chlorine and salt has healing properties. Swimming in the pool is something we set aside time every day to do, it's so therapuetic!
reviews.title: We Loved It Here

likes.liked: — Private pool & location in Ubud's main hub

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I just love the tranquility Kajane offers, the lush foilage and beautiful greenery with the padi fields just next to the property. Another great thing is that you get chauffered anywhere within Ubud, they serve complimentary afternoon tea to your villa everyday and don't get me started on the bed - the sheets are divine, makes getting up in the morning real tough but then the pool beckons. Ah... just the way a holiday should be.
reviews.title: All you ever wanted and more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just got back from Ubud (yesterday) after staying at Kajane Mua in a Toya Maya villa for 4 nights.
reviews.title: Fantastic Kajane Mua

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All I can say is that the reviews are completely true. It was excellent, clean, modern, comfortable, accommodation without being ostentacious or pretentious.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel
Absolutely Fantastic - highly recommend
reviews.text: We were returning to Ubud after 17 years, this time with two children ( 11+12 yrs ) to see how it had all changed, Kajane was a jewel that we did not expect to find. The Villas are simply fantastic, we had a two bed with private pool at the back of the resort away from the main road, this did mean climbing some steps but did not bother us.

reviews.title: Fantstic
reviews.text: The villa had a beautiful double bed upstairs with large ensuite modern bathroom, downstairs was a twin room again with ensuite.

reviews.title: Good, not amzing
reviews.text: There is plenty of seating and dining space both upstairs and downstairs so that everyone can relax. The children had their own space which they greatly appreciated.

reviews.title: Excellent for families with young children
reviews.text: Full american breakfast or local food was cooked to order and delivered to the villa in the morning where the staff set up breakfast and even toasted the bread for you there and then! Whilst we did occasionally hear the guests in the next villa it did not matter as we were so happy relaxing by our pool having complimentary afternoon tea and cake, all served by room service.

reviews.title: An unknown gem needing 10% more
reviews.text: Outside the villas on Monkey Forest Road the hustle and bustle goes on and whilst Ubud has changed, we found little evidence of the rice paddies that used to be there, we enjoyed our relaxing stay. There are plenty of restaurants to choose from within walking distance or you can go for a great massage at a local spa and shopping for souvenirs. If you need to go a bit further within Udud one of the Kajane cars will drop you, it was never too much of a problem for the staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Kajane for our 1 year wedding anniversary from 29 December to 2 January 08. It was an amazing experience and we were thrilled by the villa and the service.
reviews.title: Magnificent !

likes.liked: — The villa and the pool are amazing. Also the candle light set up..it was so good!
likes.disliked: — There are only a few villas available, so they go very quick :)

reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoyed the 6 days
reviews.text: We booked directly through the hotel and received an excellent deal unmatchable by any other hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Beji Giri for 3 nights and Toya for last night. Beji villas has the best view and villa! There was a problem with our pool, so we could not use it for 1 day until they fix it.
reviews.title: Must stay at Kajane

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am very happy that the staff were giving us another room to use after checking out as our flight is in the evening.
reviews.title: Magical!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall the experience, the people and the service was top class and we will definitely come back.
reviews.title: Fantastic

likes.disliked: — Not much, but be careful if you're not fit and able bodied. Getting to some of the villa's might be hard.

aka: Kajane Mua Private Villa & Mansion Hotel Ubud
description: Theese exclusive private villa offers ten individually-designed spacious one bedroom villas and twelve more two-bedroom, three-bedroom, four-bedroom villas with locally-crafted furnishings reflecting Balinese and Javanese influences. Long glass windows and doors mirror the bamboo hand-woven ceiling of the room and view the green tropical garden at staggering ravine or rice terrace.
